title: Which tablet is best used for whiteboarding? - Quora

response.answer_text: People are using tablets as an affordable option. To be more precise, Wacom's - CTL490DW Intuos Draw Creative Pen TabletWacom's - CTL 471I-ball 5540 UHuion K58XP-Pen G430 OSU Tablet Ultrathin Graphic TabletAre preferred by many of the designers because of its simple usage and affordable cost with advanced features.
Wacom CTL490DW Intuos Draw Creative Pen Tablet. If you're looking for a more affordable option, this one also comes recommended: XP-Pen G430 OSU Tablet Ultrathin Graphic Tablet.
